revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC52U |revision=A1 (2.30) |upc=886227461561 |asin=B00I1K3T8G |newegg=N82E16833320179 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/20/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTAC52U |ic_id=3568A-RTAC52U |pcb_id=1244-01000923-50U |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1318-BMTH, CTPPP80B; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Zentel |fla1_model=A5U1GA31ATS-BC |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6JB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1318-BMTH, CTPPP80B; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E;MT7610EN, 1315-AMAL, DTPNP859; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=AiCloud support |stock_boot=U-Boot;;(UBI); |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC750 Dual-Band Wireless Router}} Great-value wireless router for home and cloud use :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=RTAC52U}} The '''ASUS''' logo, "1244-01000923-50U", and "U REV 2.30" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The test report states the manuf. as ''Datamax Electronics (DongGuan)'' :This is presumed to be an ''[[Edimax]]'' P/N (1244-) Future support may be available with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} (?) :The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot''' (NAND/UBI) Default SSIDs are per the FCC manual. :Concurrent dual-band, 2x2 ('''300'''Mbps [11n] max.) @ 2.4GHz, :1x1 ('''433'''Mbps [11ac] / '''150'''Mbps [11n] max.) @ 5GHz {{WiFiCert|WFA50145|10/04/2013}} ===Additional specifications=== * USB functionality: 3G/4G connectivity, printer sharing, network storage * Multiple SSIDs: up to 6 (3x 2.4GHz, 3x 5GHz) * Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::187 mm x 145 mm x 25 mm]] * Weight: [[Weight::270 g]] ===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is a :'''DVE''' DSA-12PFA-09 FUS 120100. {{hasPowerSupply |brand=DVE |model=DSA-12PFA-09 |revision=FUS 120100 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |output_OD=5.5 |output_ID=2.1 |output_LEN=9.5 |manuf_country=China |style=small, horiz. }}

Additional external links

===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/150-asus-rt-ac52u.html Asus RT-AC52U On '''FoxNetwork'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?p=80332 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (EN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674 On '''IXBT'''] (RU) ===Misc=== *[http://www.mediatek.com/_en/03_news/01-2_newsDetail.php?sn=1063 ''MediaTek News - MediaTek First to Bring 802.11ac 1T1R''] ===Build info=== per ''ASUSWRT'' source (per an older [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/commit/b2630aed8d3782d4f184e207ad4a28abc0340d78 target.mak
revision on the ''asuswrt-merlin'' github]) 
#########################################
# MTK platform, linux-2.6.36.x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
# NOR, SPI, NAND
# Valild option for DRAM are shown below:
# 8M, 16M, 32M, 64M, 128M, 256M
# Valid option for SECOND_IF are shown below:
# NONE, MT7610
# RT3092, RT5392, RT5592, RT3593, RT3572, RT5572 (TBD) 
##########################################
 
export RT-AC52U := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y 
SAMBA3=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" APP="network" 
AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y SHP=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC52U" RTAC52U=y NTFS3G=y BECEEM=y ODMPID=y 
WEBDAV=y CLOUDSYNC=y BTN_WIFITOG=y UBI=y UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y DUAL_TRX=y LED_ALL=y NEW_RGDM=y 
EXT4FS=y RA_SKU=y \
BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND \
DRAM=128M \
SECOND_IF=MT7610 \
EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7620_BAUDRATE=115200 RT2880_DRAM_128M=y UBOOT_CMDLINE=y 
EXTERNAL_PA_EXTERNAL_LNA=y"
===See also=== {{ASUS AC products}} __NOTOC__
